const spawn = require('./spawn.js');

module.exports = (opts = {}) => spawn(['status', '--porcelain=v1', '-uno'], opts).then(res => res.stdout.trim().split(/\r?\n+/).map(l => l.trim()).filter(l => l).length ? false : true);

sourcesContent:
const spawn = require('./spawn.js')

module.exports = (opts = {}) =>
  spawn([ 'status', '--porcelain=v1', '-uno' ], opts)
    .then(res => res.stdout.trim().split(/\r?\n+/)
      .map(l => l.trim()).filter(l => l).length ? false : true)
